rlang.core.parse(rlang: str, prior_knowledge: Optional[rlang.knowledge.RLangKnowledge] = None) → rlang.knowledge.RLangKnowledge¶

Parses an rlang string

Parameters

  • rlang – string containing rlang

  • mdp_metadata (optional) – an MDPMetadata object

  • prior_knowledge (optional) – an RLangKnowledge object

Returns

An RLangKnowledge object

rlang.knowledge module¶

class rlang.knowledge.RLangKnowledge¶

Bases: collections.abc.MutableMapping

Acts as a container for Groundings.

Acts just like a Python dictionary.

reward_function¶

RewardFunction A partial specification of the reward function

transition_function¶

TransitionFunction A partial specification of the transition function

Examples

base = RLangKnowledge()
base['x_location'] = Factor([1])

Parameters

  • action – Action, optional

Returns

A dictionary containing all GroundingFunctions which can be predicted for the next state
